thread.title: This Is the Perfect Protest Sign to Troll the Religious Right
thread.title_full: This Is the Perfect Protest Sign to Troll the Religious Right

author: Hemant Mehta
title: This Is the Perfect Protest Sign to Troll the Religious Right
text:
February 14, 2017 by Hemant Mehta Leave a Comment 
I’ve seen a lot of clever protest signs over the past few weeks, but this one has to sting the Right: 
As we’ve seen already, the Christian Right doesn’t give a damn about Jesus. They love to pretend to follow his teachings, but they actively support a President whose life has been dedicated to doing the opposite of everything Jesus supposedly stood for. They’ll let anything slide, even Donald Trump bragging about committing sexual assault, if it means they get a Supreme Court pick they like. 
As Rachel Held Evans put so well the other day, 
Not that evangelical Christians ever had any moral authority, but they sure as hell don’t have it now.
